Row.Text: Our people are now cruising on armoured boats and beating war drums all day, every day. I worry the rest of the world will succumb to the influence of your culture. Oh, incidentally, do you have anywhere I could stay for a little bit? I haven't slept in days.

Our predecessors were corrupt, and our Civil Examination System is incredibly flawed as a result! My lord, I suggest we implement grand reforms of the system to improve the lifes of everyone! Well, everyone except the corrupt officials, that is.
